title: How to deal with a duo players' report
body:
In a game, our mid always stand at mid and do nothing, I try to talk with him and he refuse, and use "sb" to me, and keep speaking in Chinese while i use English.
After game, before i report him, he told me that he has 2 friend in the game and i was reported..
It is unfair because of he has 2 friend and I only have myself.

replies.body:
False reports will be worse for him than they are for you, as long as you didn't do anything to actually warrant a report, it will backfire on him.

As for the game and how it is played and what you can do about it, you can suck shit and deal with the lose, there is really not much else you can do.

Remembering that matchmaking should be matching duo or more players with those of a higher rank to allow for the fact they SHOULD be playing better as a team, this just means you have to deal with 2 or more players of a lower skill level.

> It is unfair because of he has 2 friend and I only have myself.

Nope. All 9 people in that game could have reported you and it wouldn't make a difference in the outcome. Punishments are given out based on negative/toxic actions taken by players, not the number of reports they receive from a single game. Like Raven said, if you did nothing wrong you've got nothing to worry about, and it will backfire on those 3 players.
